message:
هو أنا لو عندى فكرة موقع كويسة، وعايز A raise fund عشان أشغل بروجرمرس وكده، أعمل أيه؟ أو أيه الخطوات اللى المفروض أخدها؟ ولو قررت أدخل مع مجموعة شركة أيه الخطوات اللى أخدها عشان أضمن حقوقى وأن الفكرة متتسرقش خصوصا أنها بسيطة وممكن تجيب بتاع عشرة عشرين ألف زائر مثلا فى الشهر. 
لو حد عنده مقالات أو لنكات أو حد يقدر يساعدنى ياريت يكلمنى، شكرًا ليكم.

data.message: Google is your best friend, nothing easy and there is no 100% sure way.
ماحدش هايديك fund على مجرد الفكرة. على الأقل prototype

1-Do ProtoTupe
2-try Indigogo , Zoomal , or Kickstarter(need to be lic in US/Delaware)
Note idea is not important , what its important is the execution

if the idea is simple, then I can 100% guarantee you that somebody tried it before, you need to figure out why it didn't work with those other people.
I would recommend that you find a technical friend that is convinced by your idea, and work together to build a prototype, then you would become co-founders, after that you need to define your business model (check the famous business model canvas), study the market (identify your target audience) and make predictions for your costs and revenues. After that prepare a nice presentation containing all these numbers, you will use that presentation to talk with investors and basically ... convince them that if they give you their money, you will bring them back more money soon enough.
As for where do you get the chance to present your idea to investors, there are many places and events for that, a great example is RiseUp Summit which happened during the past three days.
I look at it this way, you cannot own an idea, but you can own the execution.
thank you all, this was very very helpful
No one gives fund for ideas. if you don't invest on it from your own pocket it means you don't trust it would be successful (that's what investors see)
